26a4('bum): phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis
26a5('bum): theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// chos thams cad
26a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul
26a7('bum): gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po pa'i
26b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang
26b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
26b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
26b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
26b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
26b6('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
26b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
27a1('bum): stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27a2('bum): chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par
27a3('bum): shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu
27a4('bum): dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun
27a5('bum): 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang /
27a6('bum): rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / khyad zhugs pa'i
27a7('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta
27b1('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
27b2('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
27b3('bum): dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
27b4('bum): dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
27b5('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
27b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa
27b7('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu
28a1('bum): 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la
28a2('bum): yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
28a3('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par
28a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa
28a5('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro
28a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
28a7('bum): tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
28b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang /
28b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
28b3('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi
28b4('bum): dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang /
28b5('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
28b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab
28b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs
29a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
29a2('bum): las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
29a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i
29a4('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
29a5('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
29a6('bum): tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
29a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
29b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
29b2('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i
29b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
29b4('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
29b5('bum): dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
29b6('bum): cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
29b7('bum): la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang
30a1('bum): thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//
30a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis/ thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs
30a3('bum): pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba
30a4('bum): bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
30a5('bum): pha rol tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
30a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
30a7('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
30b1('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
30b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang /
30b3('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
30b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
30b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba
30b6('bum): gang gis/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
30b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par
31a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs
31a2('bum): pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya
31a3('bum): pa/ bam po gsum pa// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam
31a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha tu pa dang / nang stong
31a5('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
31a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
31a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
31b1('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
31b2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
31b3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
31b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i
31b5('bum): chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar//
31b6('bum): 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug
31b7('bum): pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i
32a1('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs
32a2('bum): pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin
32a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
32a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha
32a5('bum): ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
32a6('bum): dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
32a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
32b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs
32b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
32b3('bum): par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro//
32b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
32b5('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa
32b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i
32b7('bum): spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong
33a1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul
33a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
33a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong
33a4('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
33a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
33a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
33a7('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
33b1('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems
33b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
33b3('bum): du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
33b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par
33b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i
33b6('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
33b7('bum): po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu
34a1('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
34a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
34a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
34a4('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi
34a5('bum): dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par
34a6('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
34a7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse bdag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi
34b1('bum): pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la/ yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
34b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de
34b3('bum): yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
34b4('bum): chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
34b5('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po
34b6('bum): bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang /
34b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
35a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
35a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
35a3('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i
35a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
35a5('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang
35a6('bum): bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
35a7('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
35b1('bum): de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa
35b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
35b3('bum): po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs
35b4('bum): pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang
35b5('bum): po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
35b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
35b7('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
36a1('bum): pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu
36a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs
36a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
36a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
36a5('bum): pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
36a6('bum): pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
36a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos
36b1('bum): gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
36b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
36b3('bum): don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba
36b4('bum): bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang /
36b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
36b6('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
36b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
37a1('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
37a2('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
37a3('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
37a4('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba
37a5('bum): dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang
37a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod
37a7('bum): pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro//
37b1('bum): 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs
37b2('bum): pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur
37b3('bum): ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang /
37b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
37b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang /
37b6('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo
37b7('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
38a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
38a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
38a3('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
38a4('bum): rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang
38a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge
38a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang /
38a7('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang
38b1('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang
38b2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang /
38b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
38b4('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong
38b5('bum): pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
38b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
38b7('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
39a1('bum): bar thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
39a2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
39a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la sbyong cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa
39a4('bum): pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge
39a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa pa dang /
39a6('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang /
39a7('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par
39b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
39b2('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi
39b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
39b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
39b5('bum): dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i
39b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
39b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
40a1('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
40a2('bum): rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des
40a3('bum): na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir
40a4('bum): bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/ chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma
40a5('bum): gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dmigs pa'i tshul
40a6('bum): gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
40a7('bum): las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
40b1('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam
40b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
40b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
40b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
40b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs
40b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
40b7('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
41a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41a2('bum): chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /
41a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs
41a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam
41a5('bum): par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs
41a6('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
41a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
41b1('bum): tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
41b2('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
41b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
41b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
41b5('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ba'i
41b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
41b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
42a1('bum): gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la
42a2('bum): yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
42a3('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par
42a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang /
42a5('bum): rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs
42a6('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan te// sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
42a7('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
42b1('bum): rab kyi pha tu pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
42b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang /
42b3('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
42b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
42b5('bum): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
42b6('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub
42b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod cing / rdzus te
43a1('bum): skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom
43a2('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod na de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa
43a3('bum): de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
43a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa
43a5('bum): dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bco lnga'o//
43a6('bum): // shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya phyin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi char pa
43a7('bum): 'di phab ste/ bstan na de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ me tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
43b1('bum): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o// snyam mo// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal
43b2('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun
43b3('bum): 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i
43b4('bum): lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og gyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di
43b5('bum): snyam du sems par gyur te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste/ bstan na de la bdag cag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/ sangs
43b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo//
43b7('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul
44a1('bum): dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /
44a2('bum): dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong
44a3('bum): ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og gyi lha de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba mang po mngon par sprul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
44a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur to// mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong
44a5('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi me tog gis khebs par gyur nas/ steng gi bar snang la yang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun
44a6('bum): nas gnas par gyur to/ / de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog
44a7('bum): 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/ / 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/ chu las skyes pa ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin no// 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di
44b1('bum): dag ni yid las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni
44b2('bum): yid las byung ba ma yin no/ / ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka de ltar ma
44b3('bum): skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zad dam/ 'o ma tam gzugs kyang ma byung / tshor ba yang ma byung / 'du shes kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang ma byung / rnam par
44b4('bum): shes pa yang ma byung ba yin/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar ma zad kyi/ kau shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// kau shi ka tshor ba yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma
44b5('bum): byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no/ / kau shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no// kau shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma
44b6('bum): byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ / kau shi ka ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ma yin no// kau shi ka rna ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no// kau shi ka sna ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna ma yin no//
44b7('bum): kau shi ka lce ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no// kau shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus ma yin no// kau shi ka yid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no// kau shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/
45a1('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// kau shi ka sgra ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sgra ma yin no// kau shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dri ma yin no// kau shi ka ro ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ro ma yin
45a2('bum): no/ / kau shi ka reg ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg ma yin no// kau shi ka chos ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no// kau shi ka gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin
45a3('bum): no/ / kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa
45a4('bum): ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung
45a5('bum): ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ / kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg
45a6('bum): pa ma yin no/ / kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lus kyi
45a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa las
45b1('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma
45b2('bum): yin no/ / kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i
45b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no/ / kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma
45b4('bum): byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// kau shi ka chu'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin no//
45b5('bum): kau shi ka khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni khams ma yin no// kau shi ka rlung gi khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no// kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni nam mkha'i
45b6('bum): khams ma yin no/ / kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// kau shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// kau shi ka 'du byed ni ma byung ba ste/
45b7('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// kau shi ka dang gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dang gzugs ma yin no// kau shi ka skye mched
46a1('bum): drug ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// kau shi ka reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg pa ma yin no// kau shi ka tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no// kau shi ka
46a2('bum): sred pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sred pa ma yin no// kau shi ka len pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni len pa ma yin no// kau shi ka srid pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni srid pa ma yin no// kau shi ka skye ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang
46a3('bum): ma byung ba de ni skye ba ma yin no/ / kau shi ka rga shi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rga shi ma yin no// kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
46a4('bum): phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
46a5('bum): phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka shes rab kyi
46a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyi
46a7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka chen po stong pa
46b1('bum): nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus
46b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma
46b3('bum): yin no/ / kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi
46b4('bum): ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba
46b5('bum): ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni
46b6('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
46b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma
47a1('bum): yin no/ / kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka dbang po rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka stobs
47a2('bum): rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni stobs rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/
47a3('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka bsam gtan rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba
47a4('bum): de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/ / kau shi ka tshad pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshad pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs pa'i snyoms
47a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/ / kau shi ka rnam par thar ba brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar ba brgyad ma yin no// kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i
47a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no/ / kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin no//
47a7('bum): kau shi ka mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma byung ba
47b1('bum): ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni
47b2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no/ / kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka byams pa chen po ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no//
47b3('bum): kau shi ka snying rje chen po ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
47b4('bum): 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// kau shi ka phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni
47b5('bum): ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// kau shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka rang byang chub ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang byang chub ma
47b6('bum): yin no/ / kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//
47b7('bum): kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no// kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin no// kau shi ka phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma
48a1('bum): byung ba de ni phyir 'ong ba ma yin no/ / kau shi ka dgra bcom pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa ma yin no// kau shi ka rang sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang sangs rgyas ma yin no// kau shi
48a2('bum): ka byang chub sems dpa' ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam
48a3('bum): du sems par gyur te/ kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de ltar btags pa dang yang 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no//
48a4('bum): kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa ste/ de ltar btags pa dang yang 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
48a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi
48a6('bum): ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo/ / btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de
48a7('bum): ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to/ / kau shi ka 'du shes ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka 'du byed ni btags
48b1('bum): pa tsam mo/ / btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor
48b2('bum): gyis 'gal bar bstan to/ / kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal/ rnam par mi 'gal lo// gang 'gal/ rnam par 'gal ba de/ gnas brtan rab kyi sa
48b3('bum): bstan te/ 'gal ba med do// kau shi ka ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka rna ba ni btags pa tsam mo// btags
48b4('bum): pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'gal bar bstan to// kau shi ka sna ni btags pa tsam mo// btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab
