171b4('bum): na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin
171b5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
171b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka dang gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub
171b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dang gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka skye
172a1('bum): mched drug rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
172a2('bum): / dbus so// kau shi ka reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
172a3('bum): / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni
172a4('bum): 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka sred pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che
172a5('bum): ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka len pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
172a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha tu pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so//
172a7('bum): kau shi ka srid pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ pha tu pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' /
172b1('bum): dbus so// kau shi ka skye ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
172b2('bum): / dbus so// kau shi ka rga shi rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i
172b3('bum): mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha
172b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
172b5('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
172b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka brtson 'grus
172b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi
173a1('bum): ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha tu pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
173a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
173a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka
173a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' /
173a5('bum): dbus so// kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' /
173a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang
173a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de
173b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
173b2('bum): pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
173b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i
173b4('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so//
173b5('bum): kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i
173b6('bum): mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
173b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
174a1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka dor ba pa
174a2('bum): stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' /
174a3('bum): dbus so// kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi
174a4('bum): mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
174a5('bum): na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174a6('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i
174a7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
174b1('bum): so/ / kau shi ka dngos po pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi
174b2('bum): ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong
174b3('bum): pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
174b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
174b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka yang dag
174b6('bum): par spong ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
174b7('bum): dbus mi so// kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sngon gyi
175a1('bum): mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka dbang po rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
175a2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
175a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/ dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
175a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi so// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang
175a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus dmigs so// kau
175a6('bum): shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
175a7('bum): / dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka bsam gtan rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi sngon gyi
175b1('bum): mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi so// kau shi ka tshad pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
175b2('bum): tshad pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
175b3('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
175b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas
175b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
175b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
175b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka mngon par shes pa rgya che
176a1('bum): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/
176a2('bum): dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
176a3('bum): mtha' dmigs/ dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo'i sngon gyi
176a4('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
176a5('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka mi 'jigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
176a6('bum): pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
176a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// kau shi ka snying
176b1('bum): rje chen po rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi dmigs
176b2('bum): so/ / kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
176b3('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs/ dbus dmigs so// kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di
176b4('bum): ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya
176b5('bum): che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
176b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// kau shi ka
176b7('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzugs tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
177a1('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du
177a2('bum): gzugs kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ gzugs tshad do// gzugs tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
177a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad kyang
177a4('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ tshor ba tshad do// tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka 'du shes tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
177a5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du shes kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam
177a6('bum): mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ 'du shes tshad do// 'du shes tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka 'du byed tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
177a7('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du byed kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir
177b1('bum): 'du byed tshad do/ / 'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
177b2('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir
177b3('bum): rnam par shes pa tshad do/ / rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/
177b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/
177b5('bum): tshad do// tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rna ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
177b6('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i tshad ni dmigs su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rna ba tshad do// rna ba tshad
177b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sna tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i tshad
178a1('bum): ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ sna tshad do// sna tshad pa'i phyir/
178a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka lce tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i tshad ni su do// kau
178a3('bum): shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ lce tshad do// lce tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do//
178a4('bum): kau shi ka lus tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/
178a5('bum): nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ lus tshad do// lus tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka yid tshad pa'i phyir/
178a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi
178a7('bum): ka de bzhin du yid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ yid tshad do// yid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka gzugs tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
178b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du
178b2('bum): gzugs kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ gzugs tshad do// gzugs tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sgra tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
178b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sgra'i tshad kyang
178b4('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ sgra tshad do// sgra tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka dri tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
178b5('bum): pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dri'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad
178b6('bum): pa'i phyir/ dri tshad do// dri tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka ro tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
178b7('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du ro'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ ro tshad do// ro tshad pa'i phyir/
179a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka reg tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi tshad ni
179a2('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du reg gi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ reg tshad do// reg tshad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179a3('bum): tshad do/ / kau shi ka chos tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam
179a4('bum): mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du chos kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ chos tshad do// chos tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka gi rnam par shes
179a5('bum): pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam
179a6('bum): mkha'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ gi rnam par shes pa tshad do// gi rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes
179a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes
179b1('bum): pa'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de// nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad
179b2('bum): do/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste// de
179b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha'
179b4('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
179b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes
179b6('bum): pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/
179b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
180a1('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
180a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni
180a3('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad do// yid
180a4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
180a5('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha'
180a6('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa tshad do// gi 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
180a7('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te
180b1('bum): reg pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang
180b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka
180b3('bum): de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad
180b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i
180b5('bum): tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
180b6('bum): do/ / kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni su do//
180b7('bum): kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
181a1('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
181a2('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir
181a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181a4('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de
181a5('bum): bzhin du gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/
181a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni
181a7('bum): 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang
181b1('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
181b2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka
181b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do// sna'i
181b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
181b5('bum): tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
181b6('bum): kyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang su de/ / nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do//
181b7('bum): kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
182a1('bum): tshor ba'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad
182a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad
182a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad ni su de/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste
182a4('bum): dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad do// yid
182a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa tshad do// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa// kau shi ka sa'i khams
182a6('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad
182a7('bum): ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du sa'i khams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams tshad do// sa'i khams tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa tshad do// kau shi ka chu'i
182b1('bum): khams tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad
182b2('bum): ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du chu'i khams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams tshad do// chu'i khams tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka khams
182b3('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar khams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
182b4('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du me'i khams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ khams tshad do// khams tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rlung gi khams tshad
182b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
182b6('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du rlung gi khams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams tshad do// rlung gi khams tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka nam mkha'i
182b7('bum): khams tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper
183a1('bum): na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams tshad do// nam mkha'i khams tshad
183a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di
183a3('bum): ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rnam
183a4('bum): par shes pa'i khams tshad do/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka ma rig pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
183a5('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du ma rig pa'i chos kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i
183a6('bum): phyir/ ma rig pa tshad do// ma rig pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka 'du byed tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i
183a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du byed kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ 'du
183b1('bum): byed tshad do/ / 'du byed tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa tshad do// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
183b2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rnam
183b3('bum): par shes pa tshad do/ / rnam par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka dang gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa
183b4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dang gzugs kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dang gzugs kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam
183b5('bum): mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ dang gzugs tshad do// dang gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa tshad do// kau shi ka skye mched drug tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
183b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du skye mched drug gi tshad kyang
183b7('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug tshad do// skye mched drug tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a1('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du reg
184a2('bum): pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ reg pa tshad do// reg pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
184a3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad kyang su de/
184a4('bum): nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ tshor ba tshad do// tshor ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sred pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
184a5('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sred pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i
184a6('bum): phyir/ / sred pa tshad do// sred pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka len pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i
184a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du len pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ len pa
184b1('bum): tshad do/ / len pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka srid pa tshad pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i tshad ni dmigs
184b2('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du srid pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ srid pa tshad do// srid pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184b3('bum): phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka skye ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste
184b4('bum): dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du skye ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ skye ba tshad do// skye ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rga
184b5('bum): shi tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
184b6('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du rga shi'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rga shi tshad do// rga shi tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
184b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i
185a1('bum): tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/
185a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims
185a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ tshul
185a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
185a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
185a6('bum): pa'i tshad kyang su de/ / nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
185a7('bum): phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste
185b1('bum): dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
185b2('bum): pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di
185b3('bum): ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad
185b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
185b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi
185b6('bum): ka de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
185b7('bum): do/ / kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di
186a1('bum): lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid tshad do// nang stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes
186a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su
186a3('bum): do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid tshad do// phyi stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes
186a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni
186a5('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med do// phyi nang stong pa
186a6('bum): nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de
186a7('bum): ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/
186b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
186b2('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/
186b3('bum): nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid tshad do// chen po stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186b4('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do/ kau shi ka de bzhin du don dam pa
186b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad pa'i
186b6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
186b7('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
187a1('bum): pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas
187a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong
187a3('bum): pa nyid tshad do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
187a4('bum): 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
187a5('bum): nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa tshad
187a6('bum): do/ / kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma pa stong
187a7('bum): pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ thog ma
187b1('bum): dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid tshad do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka dor ba pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
187b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dor ba pa stong pa nyid
187b3('bum): kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid tshad do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/
187b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
187b5('bum): su med do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do//
187b6('bum): kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni
187b7('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad do//
188a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
188a2('bum): tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang
188a3('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/
188a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
188a5('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ pa stong pa nyid tshad do// pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a6('bum): tshad do/ / kau shi ka dngos po pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni
188a7('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid tshad
188b1('bum): do/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha tu pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de
188b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad
188b3('bum): pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
188b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i
188b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
188b6('bum): do/ / kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
188b7('bum): tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar
189a1('bum): gzhag pa tshad do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
189a2('bum): phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
189a3('bum): tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba tshad do// yang dag par spong ba tshad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub
189a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
189a5('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dbang
189a6('bum): po tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do//
189a7('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ dbang po tshad do// dbang po tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka stobs tshad pa'i phyir//
189b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do//
189b2('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin du stobs rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ stobs tshad do// stobs tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med
189b3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper
189b4('bum): na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag tshad do// byang chub kyi yan lag tshad
189b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
189b6('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad kyang
189b7('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka 'phags
190a1('bum): pa'i bden pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi
190a2('bum): ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad
190a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka bsam gtan tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
190a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ bsam
190a5('bum): gtan tshad do/ / bsam gtan tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka byams pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
190a6('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du byams pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir
190a7('bum): byams pa tshad do/ / byams pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka snying rje tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de
190b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du snying rje'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ snying rje tshad
190b2('bum): do/ / snying rje tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do// kau shi ka dga' ba tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
190b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar dga' ba'i tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dga' ba'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ dga' ba tshad do//
190b4('bum): dga' ba tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka btang snyoms tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
190b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar btang snyoms kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du btang snyoms kyi tshad kyang su de// nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ btang snyoms
190b6('bum): tshad do/ / btang snyoms tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
190b7('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs pa'i
191a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes
191a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka rnam par thar pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad ni
191a3('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa tshad do// rnam
191a4('bum): par thar pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de
191a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du mthar kyis gnas pa'i
191a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
191a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
191b1('bum): na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
191b2('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa tshad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
191b3('bum): mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka mngon par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste// de ci'i phyir
191b4('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha'
191b5('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa tshad do// mngon par shes pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
191b6('bum): pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad kyang
191b7('bum): su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin tshad do/ ting nge 'dzin tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
192a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo
192a2('bum): rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ / nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo tshad do// gzungs kyi sgo tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub
192a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni
192a4('bum): su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshad kyang su de// nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
192a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ kau shi ka 'jigs pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad ni su
192a6('bum): do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ 'jigs pa tshad do// 'jigs pa tshad
192a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so
192b1('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha'
192b2('bum): tshad pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa tshad do// so so yang dag par rig pa tshad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka snying rje chen po tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
192b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau
192b4('bum): shi ka de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po tshad do// snying rje chen po tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka
192b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
192b6('bum): kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad kyang su de// nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/
192b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
193a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i
193a2('bum): tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid tshad do// thams cad shes pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
193a3('bum): tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa
193a4('bum): shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ lam gyi rnam
193a5('bum): pa shes pa nyid tshad do/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad do// kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193a6('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni su do// kau shi
193a7('bum): ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang su de/ nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
193b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa tshad do/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
193b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa// kau shi ka gzugs dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
193b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi
193b4('bum): dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu do// gzugs dpag tu pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka tshor ba dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub
193b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su
193b6('bum): do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir tshor ba dpag tu do// tshor ba dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka
193b7('bum): 'du shes dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka
194a1('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du shes kyi dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir 'du shes dpag tu do// 'du shes dpag tu
194a2('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do/ / kau shi ka 'du byed dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
194a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi dpag pa ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni dmigs su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du byed kyi dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i
194a4('bum): phyir 'du byed dpag tu do/ / 'du byed dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka rnam par shes pa dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
194a5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam
194a6('bum): par shes pa'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa dpag tu do// rnam par shes pa dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka dpag
194a7('bum): tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gi dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/
194b1('bum): nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du gi dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir mig dpag tu do// dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu
194b2('bum): do/ / kau shi ka rna ba dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste
194b3('bum): dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir rna ba dpag tu do// rna ba dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
194b4('bum): pa dpag tu do/ / kau shi ka sna dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i dpag pa ni su do//
194b5('bum): kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir sna dpag tu do// sna dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
194b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do/ / kau shi ka lce dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i dpag
194b7('bum): pa ni su do/ / kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir lce dpag tu do// lce
195a1('bum): dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do/ / kau shi ka lus dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/
195a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi dpag pa yang su de/ nam
195a3('bum): mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir lus dpag tu do/ / lus dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka yid dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
195a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi dpag pa
195a5('bum): yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir yid dpag tu do// yid dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka gzugs dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
195a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su
195a7('bum): do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu do// gzugs dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do// kau shi ka sgra
195b1('bum): dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam
195b2('bum): mkha' dpag pa ni su do/ / kau shi ka de bzhin du sgra'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir sgra dpag tu do// sgra dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu do//
195b3('bum): kau shi ka dri dpag tu pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i dpag pa ni su do// kauM shi ka 'di lta
195b4('bum): ste dper na/ nam mkha' dpag pa ni su do// kau shi ka de bzhin du dri'i dpag pa yang su de/ nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir dri dpag tu do// dri dpag tu pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag
