220a2('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas
220a3('bum): pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha'
220a4('bum): yas pa dang / dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /
220a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / tshad pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
220a6('bum): dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha'
220a7('bum): yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang / snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa
220b1('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha'
220b2('bum): yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang
220b3('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na pa
220b4('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
220b5('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang chos pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
220b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na chos pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
220b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
221a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
221a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
221a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir pa mtha' yas
221a4('bum): so/ / pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so// kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// kau shi
221a5('bum): ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
221a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig yin//
221a7('bum): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig kyang me yin te/ 'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/ dngos po par du btags
221b1('bum): pa/ pa par ming du btags pa'o// rab kyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni do/
221b2('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang pa de la/ sems can mtha' yas pa yod de/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye
221b3('bum): ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par gyur pa yod dam// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma
221b4('bum): nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang
221b5('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de
221b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de/ bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do// kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do// bcom ldan
221b7('bum): 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ / chos gang yang su ma mchis te/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/
222a1('bum): 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ gi rnam par shes pa 'am
222a2('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus
222a3('bum): te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
222a4('bum): tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
222a5('bum): sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha du pa'am/ tshul
222a6('bum): khrims kyi pha tu pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong
222a7('bum): pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor
222b1('bum): ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
222b2('bum): nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/
222b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar
222b4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang
222b5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra
222b6('bum): bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/
222b7('bum): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin
223a1('bum): no/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// chos gang yang su de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/
223a2('bum): gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
223a3('bum): 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'am// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te
223a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i
223a5('bum): khams sam/ khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba
223a6('bum): 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
223a7('bum): tu pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus
223b1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa
223b2('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po
223b3('bum): rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms
223b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting
223b5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
223b6('bum): 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
223b7('bum): pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang mod kyi/ theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa dang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//
224a1('bum): lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab
224a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du
224a3('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// brtson 'grus kyi pha
224a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
224a5('bum): so/ / nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// stong pa nyid
224a6('bum): stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// 'dus byas stong
224a7('bum): pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so//
224b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi
224b2('bum): so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs
224b3('bum): pa so/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de
224b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
224b5('bum): las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / dbang po rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan
224b6('bum): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// bsam
224b7('bum): gtan rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / tshad pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
225a1('bum): so/ / rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rnam par
225a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan
225a3('bum): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so//
225a4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// byams pa chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so//
225a5('bum): snying rje chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
225a6('bum): so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa so// // shes rab kyi pha tu
225a7('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa la slob bo// tshul khrims kyi pha tu
225b1('bum): pa la slob bo/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// phyi stong pa nyid la
225b2('bum): slob bo/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// mtha' las
225b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dor ba pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//
225b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos po pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo// yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo//
225b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo// dbang po rnams la slob bo// stobs rnams la slob bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo//
225b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la slob bo// tshad pa rnams la slob bo// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo//
225b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la slob bo// mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
226a1('bum): la slob bo/ / 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo// byams pa chen po la slob bo// snying rje chen po la slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo// rgyun tu zhugs
226a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// phyid 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo// rang byang chub la slob bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
226a3('bum): nyid la slob bo/ / lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang 'bral bar spyod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/ nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
226a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham 'bring byed cing / rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
226a5('bum): tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226a6('bum): pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar
226a7('bum): ma gyur to/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// thog ma dang
226b1('bum): tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur
226b2('bum): to/ / pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dran pa nye bar gzhag
226b3('bum): pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
226b4('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshad pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzugs
226b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/ / rnam par thar pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
226b6('bum): smon pa pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar
226b7('bum): ma gyur to/ / 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byams pa chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to// snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
227a1('bum): dang yang bral bar ma gyur te/ de pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to// lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
227a2('bum): mar me mdzad kyis nga la khye'u khyod ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
227a3('bum): mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
227a4('bum): byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs len 'dor ba'i
227a5('bum): tshul dang / tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba len
227a6('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sgra len 'dor ba'i
227a7('bum): tshul dang / dri len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gi rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par
227b1('bum): shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa len
227b2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gi 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus
227b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lan 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul
227b4('bum): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
227b5('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam
227b6('bum): mkha'i khams mi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
227b7('bum): dang gzugs len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched drug len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa len 'dor
228a1('bum): ba'i tshul dang / srid pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga shi len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len
228a2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa len
228a3('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid
228a4('bum): len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
228a5('bum): len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid len
228a6('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid len
228a7('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
228b1('bum): len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa len 'dor ba'i
228b2('bum): tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams len 'dor
228b3('bum): ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa len
228b4('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams len 'dor
228b5('bum): ba'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs
228b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid len 'dor ba'i tshuld gyis/
228b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i
229a1('bum): 'khor bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul
229a2('bum): dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang /
229a3('bum): tshad snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad che ba'i lha'i bu
229a4('bum): dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas/ de dag thams cad
229a5('bum): dpang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
229a6('bum): 'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad
229a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang / 'bral ba de dag ni/ bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gzugs
229b1('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes
229b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed do// smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed
229b3('bum): do/ / de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
229b4('bum): lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/
229b5('bum): mtshan ma pas/ mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed/ smon pa pas/ smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
229b6('bum): sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos stong pa nyid
229b7('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed do//
230a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i rnam
230a2('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong
230a3('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed
230a4('bum): do/ / de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te
230a5('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
230a6('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags r+ny+hed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags r+ny+hed do/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags r+ny+hed do// de ni 'di ltar
230a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i
230b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
230b2('bum): par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/
230b3('bum): smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/
230b4('bum): khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid
230b5('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni
230b6('bum): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
230b7('bum): 'gyur/ dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin
231a1('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid
231a2('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa
231a3('bum): pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do/ / de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
231a4('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu
231a5('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la
231a6('bum): glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
231a7('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
231b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mtha' las
231b2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
231b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
231b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos
231b5('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa pas
231b6('bum): smon pa pa la glags rnyed do/ / de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
231b7('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
232a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis
232a2('bum): stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
232a3('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshad pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
232a4('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
232a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa
232a6('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la
232a7('bum): glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'jigs
232b1('bum): pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid shin tu
232b2('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma pa la
232b3('bum): glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa
232b4('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags rnyed/ mtshan ma pas mtshan ma
232b5('bum): pa la glags rnyed/ smon pa pas smon pa pa la glags rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi
232b6('bum): ngo bo nyid do/ / kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni / ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba de dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
232b7('bum): gis de pa'i tshul gyis/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nyam nga ba spongs bas dus byed par
233a1('bum): yang 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gis/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par spang bas bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir
233a2('bum): ro/ / kau shi ka gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
233a3('bum): lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
233a4('bum): 'di ma thos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul
233a5('bum): bzhin du yid la bya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed
233a6('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am/
233a7('bum): sngang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi
233b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chen po stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// don dam pa stong pa nyid de
233b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
233b3('bum): nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang bzhin stong pa
233b4('bum): nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// pa
233b5('bum): stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po pa'i ngo
233b6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid de pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ / de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi
233b7('bum): lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
234a1('bum): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
234a2('bum): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la 'ang rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyi ba dang / 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par
234a3('bum): bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
234a4('bum): rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ lha las phongs pa rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ las dbul ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ nad dang gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad cing 'jig pa dang / ma mchis par 'gyur/
234a5('bum): mu ge'i zhugs ngam thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshad
234a6('bum): pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
234a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa 'jig
234b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/

234b5('bum): bar 'gyur/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
234b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
234b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten
235a1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du

235a5('bum): zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis pa 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
235a6('bum): rnams mchis par 'gyur/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan

235b1('bum): rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung snang gi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge ba'i lha rnams
235b2('bum): mchis par 'gyur/ chung dge'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung che'i lha rnams mchis par

238a2('bum): bas na lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun 'chad par de la bsrung pa
238a3('bum): dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o// kau shi ka gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa de ni/ nga la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
238a4('bum): stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so// de bas na lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu
238a5('bum): dud du bya'o/ / mchod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun 'chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam
238a6('bum): bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ rtsi skyang gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis gang bar gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam
238a7('bum): 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa/ pha rol tu phyin
238b1('bum): pa drug dang ma bral ba zhig la rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag yod pas/ byang chub
238b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

238b6('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
238b7('bum): par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gis tshe 'di la 'thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa
239a1('bum): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bgyi ba dang /

239a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du dran pa mi nyams pa dang rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
239a4('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dbyangs phun sum
239a5('bum): tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / / ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul cing / 'jig
239a6('bum): rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su mchi ba dang / gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skye zhing byung bar ma gyur pa de dang de dag tu mchis shing / sbyin pa'i pha tu pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
239a7('bum): tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
239b1('bum): pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang /

240a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan

242a7('bum): brtsad par 'dod pa dang / dgal bar 'dod pa zhig byung na/ brgal bar 'dod pa dang / dbral bar 'dod pa dang / brtsad par 'dod pa dang / dgal bar 'dod pa de dag gis rgol ba dang / dbral bar bya ba dang / brtsad pa dang / 'gal bar byed
242b1('bum): pa gang dang gang byung ba kun kyang myur du nub cing par 'gyur te/ brgal bar dga' ba dang / dbral bar dga' ba dang / brtsad par dga' ba dang / dgal bar dga' ba de dag gi bsam pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
242b2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha tu pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
242b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gang gi don du sems can rnams yun ring por 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / shags su gyur pa'i phyi nang
242b4('bum): gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro// gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por tshul khrims ngan par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos

243a1('bum): g.yengs par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ sems can de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro// gang gi don du sems

243a4('bum): bcil te/ sems can de dag bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// tshad pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// mngon

243b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ / 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// byams pa chen po la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir

243b4('bum): la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// bla na pa yang dag
243b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro/ / kau shi ka de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di la yon tan de dag 'byung ste/ tshe rabs gzhan la
243b6('bum): yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du rab tu bkod nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
243b7('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ kau shi ka de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshe rabs gzhan la 'byung ba'i yon tan dang legs pa dag go/ kau shi ka gzhan yang sa'i phyogs
244a1('bum): gang na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yod pa'i sa'i phyogs der bdud dam/ bdud kyi
244a2('bum): ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'am/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba'am/ gang zag nga rgyal can rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal ba'am/ brtsad pa 'am/ dgal ba 'am/ par bya ba'i phyir/ 'ong bar
244a3('bum): nus te/ de'i gong du de dag la yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang bsgom pas/ theg pa gsum gyis byung nas/ sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'di lta ste
244a4('bum): dper na/ rtsi ma gi zhes bya ba/ dug thams cad zhi bar byad pa yod de/ der sbrul lam/ srog chags bkres pas mnar cing zas tshol ba zhig gis/ srog chags kyi rigs la la mthong bar gyur te/ des srog chags kyi rigs de bza'
244a5('bum): ba'i phyir/ de'i rjes su 'brang ste/ bsnyags par gyur na/ de nas srog chags kyi rigs de 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste/ rtsi ma gi gang na yod pa der song na/ de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir
244a6('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni/ rtsi ma gi'i yon tan te/ kau shi ka rtsi ma gi de ni de lta bu'i mthu dang ldan no// kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
244a7('bum): pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la ni/ kau shi ka rgol ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gal bar byed pa gang dang gang byung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi
244b1('bum): brjid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthus de dag nye bar zhi ba dang par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab
244b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sdig to dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa ste/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sdig to dge ba'i chos gang thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing / rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin zhe na/
244b3('bum): 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// ma rig pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// 'du byed nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel
244b4('bum): bar byed pa ma yin no/ / rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// dang gzugs nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// skye mched drag nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam
244b5('bum): par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ / reg pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sred pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar
244b6('bum): byed pa ma yin no/ / len pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// srid pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// skye ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// rga
244b7('bum): shi nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid bde ba dang / 'khrug pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sdug
245a1('bum): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig gi bar du nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// bar du gcod pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sgrib pa rnams nye
245a2('bum): bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// bag la nyal ba rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// kun nas ldang ba rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// bdag tu lta ba nye
245a3('bum): bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sems can du lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// srog tu lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// 'gro bar lta ba
245a4('bum): nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// gso bar lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// skyes bur lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// gang zag tu lta ba nye
245a5('bum): bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// shed can du lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// shed bdag tu lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// byed pa por lta ba
245a6('bum): nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba por lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// shes pa por lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// mthong pa
245a7('bum): por lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// chad par lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ yod par lta ba nye bar

245b2('bum): rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ / tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// gnod sems nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// le lo nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam
245b3('bum): par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ / 'khrug pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// shes rab 'chal pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// rtag par 'du shes pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/

247b2('bum): yin te/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha
247b3('bum): rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang
247b4('bum): ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la rtag tu rgyun chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba byed do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang bzhugs
247b5('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la rtag tu rgyun chad par bsrung ba dang /

249a7('bum): su 'grib par 'gyur ro/ / pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/ yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/
