276b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
276b7('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
277a1('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
277a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
277a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag
277a4('bum): cag gi ston pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir 'ong ba dang /
277a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa
277a6('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / nang stong
277a7('bum): pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa
277b1('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor pa med pa stong pa nyid
277b2('bum): la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid la
277b3('bum): slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
277b4('bum): pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang / stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i
277b5('bum): bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar
277b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la
277b7('bum): slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa
278a1('bum): chen po la slob slob pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /
278a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa
278a3('bum): rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ / pha rol tu phyin to// pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /
278a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
278a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol
278a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la
278a7('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
278b1('bum): bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
278b2('bum): yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
278b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka sbyin pa'i
278b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de
278b5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la
278b6('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
278b7('bum): de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi
279a1('bum): skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279a2('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
279a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di
279a4('bum): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
279a5('bum): na/ kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas
279a6('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye
279a7('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
279b1('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan
279b2('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dor ba pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
279b3('bum): na/ kau shi ka dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang bzhin
279b4('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye
279b5('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
279b6('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang
279b7('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
280a1('bum): ka pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag
280a2('bum): gis dngos po pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te// lha dang
280a3('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
280a4('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan
280a5('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de
280a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
280a7('bum): de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
280b1('bum): lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
280b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dbang po rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
280b3('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan
280b4('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
280b5('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags
280b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha
280b7('bum): dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
281a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
281a2('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshad pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka tshad pa 'di dag ni
281a3('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten
281a4('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
281a5('bum): bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin
281a6('bum): te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos
281a7('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
281b1('bum): smon pa pa la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
281b2('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
281b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang
281b4('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
281b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yan te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
281b6('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye
281b7('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis 'jigs pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
282a1('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan
282a2('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
282a3('bum): snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
282a4('bum): pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
282a5('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
282a6('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
282a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i
282b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// //
282b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa// / kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin
282b3('bum): po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas
282b4('bum): kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ kau
282b5('bum): shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
282b6('bum): stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya
282b7('bum): cher ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
283a1('bum): kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo// kau shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gal te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
283a2('bum): la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la
283a3('bum): nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi
283a4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
283a5('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
283a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang /
283a7('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams
283b1('bum): de ches mang du 'phel lo/ / kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
283b2('bum): ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas
283b3('bum): kyi tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi
283b4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
283b5('bum): nams mang du 'phel lam/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
283b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
283b7('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
284a1('bum): gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
284a2('bum): mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas
284a3('bum): kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi

288a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
