288b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i
288b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
288b3('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
288b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
288b5('bum): dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
288b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang /
288b7('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa
289a1('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
289a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so/ / de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
289a3('bum): kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ / phyin to// phyin par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u brgyad do// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
289a4('bum): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mod dag gi/ bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs
289a5('bum): bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
289a6('bum): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad grangs / bsam gyis
289a7('bum): khyab/ mtshungs pa / dpag tu par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams
289b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/
289b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
289b3('bum): ni/ nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes
289b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
289b5('bum): phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// shes
289b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// shes
289b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid
290a1('bum): do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dran pa
290a2('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/
290a3('bum): dbang po rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags
290a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
290a5('bum): ni/ tshad pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
290a6('bum): pa las byung ba ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
290a7('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
290b1('bum): phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// shes
290b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byams pa chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab
290b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sems can yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha
290b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha
290b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ theg pa chen po'o// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290b6('bum): las byung ba ni/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
290b7('bum): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas//
291a1('bum): bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /
291a2('bum): bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar 'gro// rgyur yang nye bar bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
291a3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog nub par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las
291a4('bum): kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
291a5('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du
291a6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
291a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong /
291b1('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha'
291b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig
291b3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos
291b4('bum): po pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du
291b5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams
291b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten
291b7('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
292a1('bum): ro/ / rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
292a2('bum): smon pa pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
292a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung
292a4('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig
292a5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
292a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe
292a7('bum): ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
292b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
292b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
292b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha
292b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i
292b5('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
292b6('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams
292b7('bum): dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do// bla na
293a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
293a2('bum): khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris
293a3('bum): kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha
293a4('bum): rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha
293a5('bum): rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po
293a6('bum): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/ / grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par
293a7('bum): bya'o/ / grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas
293b1('bum): pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshul
293b2('bum): rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
293b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung
293b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
293b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
293b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig
293b7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po
294a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
294a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams
294a3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
294a4('bum): ro/ / bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig
294a5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon
294a6('bum): par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
294a7('bum): ro/ / 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du
294b1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong
294b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dgra bcom pa nyi da 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
294b3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub bar gyis shig/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
294b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab mo bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tsham bsngal lo snyam na/
294b5('bum): de'i tshe kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha ton gyis shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag zlos shing /
294b6('bum): rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang / kau shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis
294b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas/ lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan
295a1('bum): pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ mthar kyis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
295a2('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung
295a3('bum): ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
295a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
295a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang
295a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan
295a7('bum): thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
295b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa
295b2('bum): dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
295b3('bum): kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab
295b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag
295b5('bum): kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig
295b6('bum): sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
295b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
296a1('bum): rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par
296a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
296a3('bum): phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa
296a4('bum): nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa
296a5('bum): nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid
296a6('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
296a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar
296b1('bum): gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub
296b2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ kyis
296b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin
296b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
296b5('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang
296b6('bum): dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
296b7('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
297a1('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa
297a2('bum): yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/
297a3('bum): kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs
297a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
297a5('bum): pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su
297a6('bum): yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
297a7('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
297b1('bum): su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dor ba
297b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
297b3('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po pa
297b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na
297b5('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
297b6('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig
297b7('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
298a1('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'jigs pa rnams 'jig
298a2('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
298a3('bum): yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa
298a4('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig
298a5('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ rtsi dang rgyu skar dang /
298a6('bum): skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do// kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad
298a7('bum): pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha tu pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
298b1('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsa
298b2('bum): thams cad gdags su yod do/ / slob pa dang / slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
298b3('bum): kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
298b4('bum): pa'i chos ston to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan
298b5('bum): pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
298b6('bum): spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
298b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba
299a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po
299a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
299a3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la
299a4('bum): spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
299a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
299a6('bum): spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
299a7('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa
299b1('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
299b2('bum): pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
299b3('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan kyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
299b4('bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba
299b5('bum): lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
299b6('bum): byed pa de/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par 'gyur ro// myes dus byed par 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtsa
299b7('bum): gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po dang / blon pos gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du
300a1('bum): song na/ de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
300a2('bum): zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang / mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de
300a3('bum): la rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing / dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am
300a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag/ snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
300a5('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi
300a6('bum): yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar 'gyur te// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu
300a7('bum): phyin pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
300b1('bum): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad pa rnams dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
300b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
300b3('bum): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su
300b4('bum): skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye'o// de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i rigs su skye/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ smye sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag dar ba 'am/ shen pa
300b5('bum): 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs su skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun 'chad par chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing
300b6('bum): 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba
300b7('bum): dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed/ sangs
301a1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ / kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/
301a2('bum): klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byas te/ de dag ni nam bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
301a3('bum): bar du/ tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan/ de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu dgu'o// // de
301a4('bum): nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba/ glags lta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun
301a5('bum): tu rgyu ba brgya po glags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong
301a6('bum): nas/ bar chad byed par 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha
301a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do/ / de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir
301b1('bum): dong ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dod na
301b2('bum): de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes
301b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// sha ra dwa
301b4('bum): ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags lta
301b5('bum): ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab
301b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
301b7('bum): rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun
302a1('bum): 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad che ba dang /
302a2('bum): 'bras bu che ba dang / che ba dang / gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji
302a3('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha tu pa las byung ba sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi
302a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha
302a5('bum): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe
302a6('bum): na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed
302a7('bum): cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa
302b1('bum): de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
302b2('bum): dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
302b3('bum): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha
302b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
302b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes
302b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
302b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
303a1('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi
303a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs
303a3('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
303a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
303a5('bum): ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
303a6('bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab
303a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /
303b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang
303b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
303b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
303b4('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
303b5('bum): pa las byung ba sha stag go/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
303b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
303b7('bum): pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
304a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
304a2('bum): chen po rnams/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bar chad bya'o/ snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyis/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag
304a3('bum): bzhi ba mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul
304a4('bum): cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po bim bi sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam phod/ rgyal
304a5('bum): po sde rab tu 'pham byed dang / shAkya rnams dang / lid tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam phod de/ bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing / glags
304a6('bum): tshol/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o// dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
304a7('bum): gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can
304b1('bum): de dag lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir log go/ de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bar snang gi
304b2('bum): nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod
304b3('bum): par gyur cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du
304b4('bum): gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs
304b5('bum): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung
304b6('bum): bar 'gyur 'gyur zhe'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing
304b7('bum): glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og gyi bar gyi
305a1('bum): lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de
305a2('bum): srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong
305a3('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub par 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas
305a4('bum): shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
305a5('bum): dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis
305a6('bum): lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
305a7('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang
305b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
305b2('bum): cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni ston pa 'am/ ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
305b3('bum): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/
305b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro//
305b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis
305b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes
305b7('bum): gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa
306a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
306a2('bum): gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis
306a3('bum): su bgyir ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
306a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
306a5('bum): gzhan la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

306a7('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ji ltar shes rab kyi/ pha tu pa'i/ yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa'i yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de

306b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi yang yongs su
