338a1('bum): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar
338a2('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan tu mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang
338a3('bum): yang 'bral bar bya'o/ / kau shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di ma bzung ma bcangs ma blags/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na yang / rigs kyi bu
338a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
338a5('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ / bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// kau shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa
338a6('bum): yin/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing de bris te/ tog dang /
338a7('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
338b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam
338b2('bum): 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas// bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
338b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
338b4('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha tu
338b5('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gcig go/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba
338b6('bum): zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
338b7('bum): gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang la las stsal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
339a1('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gror ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ rton pa yang ma lags/ btsun par bgyid pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
339a2('bum): gdung la rim gror bgyi bar 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ phu dud du bgyi bar 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
339a3('bum): dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag
339a4('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi
339a5('bum): phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
339a6('bum): rim gror bgyid cing / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di gshegs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/ lha dang / dang / lha ma
339a7('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid do//
339b1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du pa/ gzugs pa/ bltar pa/ thogs pa pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di
339b2('bum): ltar mtshan nyid pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du pa/ gzugs pa/ bltar pa/ thogs pa pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid pa la gzung bar sems/ de
339b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/
339b4('bum): bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin
339b5('bum): par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/
339b6('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye
339b7('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi
340a1('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
340a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid nye bar
340a3('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po pa
340a4('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa
340a5('bum): ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye
340a6('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
340a7('bum): yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon
340b1('bum): par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa
340b2('bum): ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan
340b3('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
340b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
340b5('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa

340b7('bum): pa'i pha tu pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan
341a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/

341a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa

341a5('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/

341a7('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

341b5('bum): pa la spyod pa yin no/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su

341b7('bum): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
342a1('bum): pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ kau shi ka legs so legs so// de de bzhin

342a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

342a6('bum): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis

343b3('bum): pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni
343b4('bum): 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod
343b5('bum): du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar med do// kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod
343b6('bum): pa de ni/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar do//
343b7('bum): kau shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
344a1('bum): gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar med do/ / kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de
344a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam
344a3('bum): gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// kau shi ka gang sbyin
344a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su de gnyis
344a5('bum): su byar do/ / // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
344a6('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na pa yang dag par
344a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi
344b1('bum): lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe yang lha'i
344b2('bum): bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing / phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de
344b3('bum): bzhin du gang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton tu bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
344b4('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di
344b5('bum): las byung ngo / / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyis shing gdud pa bgyis nas/ slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
344b6('bum): pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub
344b7('bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to// rgyur gyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ cha de gnyis las
345a1('bum): bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyi kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/
345a2('bum): 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang / yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
345a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
345a4('bum): pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
345a5('bum): 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan
345a6('bum): ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
345a7('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma
345b1('bum): mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis
345b2('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
345b3('bum): 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
345b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma
345b5('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
345b6('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las
345b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni smos
346a1('bum): su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
346a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni
346a3('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
346a4('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
346a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po pa stong pa nyid
346a6('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
346a7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa
346b1('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma
346b2('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du
346b3('bum): ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams
346b4('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan
346b5('bum): lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma
346b6('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
346b7('bum): mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
347a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das tshad pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
347a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
347a3('bum): 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
347a4('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
347a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa pa ni/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
347a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma
347a7('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
347b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
347b2('bum): stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
347b3('bum): 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma
347b4('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
347b5('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
347b6('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni smos su ma
347b7('bum): mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
348a1('bum): gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams cad la mtshan
348a2('bum): ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la
348a3('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
348a4('bum): mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas de'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na pa yang
348a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to// bcom ldan
348a6('bum): 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
348a7('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan
348b1('bum): dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang /
348b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / sbos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/
348b3('bum): phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni nam bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang /
348b4('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su
348b5('bum): smin par bgyi ba dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
348b6('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum
348b7('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las/ bdag ni
349a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
349a2('bum): gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par
349a3('bum): bgyis na log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha dang phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
349a4('bum): rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe
349a5('bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
349a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das
349a7('bum): pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab
349b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang 'dra ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
349b2('bum): rnams so 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/ / 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang
349b3('bum): shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
349b4('bum): dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
349b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs
349b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
349b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
350a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi
350a2('bum): dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa gsungs te/ bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las
350a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing / kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
350a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang /
350a5('bum): 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung
350a6('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
350a7('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
350b1('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa yang 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
350b2('bum): las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
350b3('bum): cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa des ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
350b4('bum): gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de ni phyir ldog pa'i sa la gnas par
350b5('bum): rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo // klog go/ kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la yang me tog dang /
350b6('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/
350b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu' ma rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
351a1('bum): phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
351a2('bum): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/
351a3('bum): skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la rten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la rten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas/ de dag gis 'jigs par 'gyur ro//
351a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
351a5('bum): pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na/ mchod pa mang 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na/
351a6('bum): bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni chen po'i mtshan sum
351a7('bum): cu rtsa gnyis so/ / 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba
351b1('bum): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad do/ / 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni
351b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/
351b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa de dag tu 'am ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba
351b4('bum): rnams kyis/ glags rnyed par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mthar kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas
351b5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams
351b6('bum): gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de
351b7('bum): ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der ma lags pa rnams kyis glags rnyed do// ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud
352a1('bum): kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid bzod de/ myur du 'pho zhing gnas so// mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/
352a2('bum): mkhris pa de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ bad kan de yang zhi
352a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i bro de yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par 'phel lo// nub mo ni snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che
352a4('bum): chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do/ / grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs
352a5('bum): de yang ha cang yang dro/ / ha cang yang grang zhing / ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la
352a6('bum): pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/ des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro//
352a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam/ rab rib can du gyur te/ gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/
352b1('bum): sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad ci byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu'am/ rab rib bam/ gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i
352b2('bum): nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ chab rnyogs pa can gyi nang du
352b3('bum): stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur
352b4('bum): ro/ / gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/
352b5('bum): chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ gos dkar pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos
352b6('bum): leb rgan gyis dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de/ shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang
352b7('bum): bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ / de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la rnyogs pa mchis pa yang nor bu
353a1('bum): rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
353a2('bum): pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//
353a3('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi rnams la yang yod// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo// nor bu rin po che chen po
353a4('bum): de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de
353a5('bum): dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar
353a6('bum): 'gro'o/ / de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal pa las/ snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin
353a7('bum): po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchis par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus sam/ sems
353b1('bum): kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa las gyur pa 'am/ ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig so//

354a1('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das
354a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan

354b1('bum): pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong

354b4('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi
354b5('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
354b6('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid
354b7('bum): kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan
355a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
355a2('bum): ldan 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do//
355a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi
355a4('bum): snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do//
355a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /
355a6('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
355a7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma
355b1('bum): mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad
355b2('bum): ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
355b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / dbang po rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
355b4('bum): gdung de dag kyang / stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
355b5('bum): gdung de dag kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad
355b6('bum): ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
355b7('bum): rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam
356a1('bum): gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshad pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
356a2('bum): tshad pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / tshad pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig
356a3('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
356a4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
356a5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
356a6('bum): kyang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam
356a7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
356b1('bum): par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
356b2('bum): bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
356b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi
356b4('bum): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed
356b5('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta
356b6('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen
356b7('bum): po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / snying rje chen po'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
357a1('bum): brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
357a2('bum): kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi
357a3('bum): snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / lam gyi
357a4('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
357a5('bum): gdung de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
357a6('bum): de dag kyang / de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /
357a7('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
357b1('bum): dag kyang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos nyid
357b2('bum): kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do//
357b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan
357b4('bum): 'das chos 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan
357b5('bum): 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis
357b6('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod
357b7('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma
358a1('bum): mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan
358a2('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das nyams pa'i
358a3('bum): chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin
358a4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha tu pa rin po che'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//
358a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//
358a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa skye 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
358a7('bum): sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha
358b1('bum): tu pa dpri ba dang / bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro
358b2('bum): ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin
358b3('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// gzhan yang
358b4('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su bltam pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig/ de
358b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de
358b6('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
358b7('bum): yongs su bsgos pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir
359a1('bum): bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs
359a2('bum): che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /
359a3('bum): bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal kyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / blags shing
359a4('bum): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
359a5('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid
359a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs
359a7('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang
359b1('bum): tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
359b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
359b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi
359b4('bum): rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam
359b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
359b6('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
359b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs
360a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su
360a2('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis
360a3('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs
360a4('bum): sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
360a5('bum): par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs nas// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
360a6('bum): du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ glo ba mches pa yang ma mchis/ mchod par 'tshal ba yang ma lags/ gzung bar
360a7('bum): 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis/ rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
360b1('bum): thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bstsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur
360b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa
360b3('bum): de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing / mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/
360b4('bum): mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs
360b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o//
360b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/
360b7('bum): bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos
361a1('bum): nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyis chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid
361a2('bum): kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
361a3('bum): kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
361a4('bum): kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
361a5('bum): dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang /
361a6('bum): stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad pa bzhi'i ye
361a7('bum): shes dang / / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
361b1('bum): ma pa dang smon pa pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / 'jigs pa
361b2('bum): bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
361b3('bum): zag pa pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos
361b4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ / de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis
361b5('bum): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/
361b6('bum): chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs
361b7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
362a1('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing / bla na pa yang dag par
362a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad grangs pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
362a3('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
362a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung
362a5('bum): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//
362a6('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo//
362a7('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad grangs pa dag na/ rang sangs
362b1('bum): rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rang byang chub thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
362b2('bum): theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma pa'i tshul dang / pa pa'i tshul dang / skye ba pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba
362b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba pa'i tshul dang / len pa pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa pa'i tshul dang / blang ba pa'i tshul dang / spang ba pa'i tshul gyis
362b4('bum): bstan te/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
362b5('bum): tshul rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma
362b6('bum): yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
362b7('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi
363a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha
363a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu drug pa//
363a3('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/
363a4('bum): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa yang 'tshal te/ sems can du pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags par pa ma mchis so// bdag tu pa ma mchis so// sems can du pa ma
363a5('bum): mchis so/ / srog tu pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar pa ma mchis so// gso bar pa ma mchis so// skyes bur pa ma mchis so// gang zag tu pa ma mchis so// shed can du pa ma
363a6('bum): mchis so/ / shed bdag tu pa ma mchis so// byed pa por pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por pa ma mchis so// shes pa por pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por pa ma mchis so// gzugs su
363a7('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / tshor bar pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par pa ma mchis so// du pa ma mchis so// rna bar
363b1('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / snar pa ma mchis so// lcer pa ma mchis so// lus su pa ma mchis so// yid du pa ma mchis so// gzugs su pa ma mchis so// sgrar pa ma mchis
363b2('bum): so/ / drir pa ma mchis so// ror pa ma mchis so// reg tu pa ma mchis so// chos su pa ma mchis so// gi rnam par shes par pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs
363b3('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / sna'i rnam par shes par pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes par pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par pa ma mchis
363b4('bum): so/ / gi 'dus te reg par pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg par pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par pa ma mchis so// lus kyi
363b5('bum): 'dus te reg par pa ma mchis so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg par pa ma mchis so// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs
363b6('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar pa ma mchis
363b7('bum): so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams su pa ma mchis so// khams su pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams
364a1('bum): su pa ma mchis so/ / nam mkha'i khams su pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams su pa ma mchis so// ma rig par pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du pa
364a2('bum): ma mchis so/ / rnam par shes par pa ma mchis so// dang gzugs su pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug tu pa ma mchis so// reg par pa ma mchis so// tshor bar pa ma mchis so//
364a3('bum): sred par pa ma mchis so// len par pa ma mchis so// srid par pa ma mchis so// skye bar pa ma mchis so// rga shir pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par pa ma mchis
364a4('bum): so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par
364a5('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so//
364a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma
364a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis
364b1('bum): so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// pa stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so//
364b2('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su pa ma mchis
364b3('bum): so/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams su pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su pa ma mchis so// byang
364b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams su pa ma mchis so/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su pa ma mchis
364b5('bum): so/ / tshad pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad du pa ma mchis so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
364b6('bum): dgur pa ma mchis so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa par pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams su pa
364b7('bum): ma mchis so/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su pa ma mchis so// 'jigs pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa
365a1('bum): rnams su pa ma mchis so/ / snying rje chen por pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su pa ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur pa ma mchis so//
365a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur pa ma mchis so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid du pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu pa ma mchis so// lam gyi
365a3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid du pa ma mchis so/ / byang chub tu pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas su pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
365a4('bum): pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis
365a5('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ pa'i tshul du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod
