365a6('bum): pas des byang chub kyang na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
365a7('bum): la spyod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la 'ang / de pa'i
365b1('bum): tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang / gtong ba'ang / len pa'ang so// tshul khrims kyang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang / tshul khrims ngan pa 'ang so// bzod
365b2('bum): pa'ang / bzod pa dang ldan pa 'ang / gnod sems kyang so// brtson 'grus kyang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa 'ang / le lo yang so// bsam gtan yang
365b3('bum): / bsam gtan pa yang / 'khrug pa yang so// shes rab kyang / shes rab dang ldan pa yang / shes rab 'chal pa yang so// kau shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha
365b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa pa'i tshul dang /
365b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rna ba pa'i tshul dang / sna pa'i tshul dang / lce pa'i tshul dang / lus pa'i tshul dang / yid pa'i tshul dang / gzugs pa'i tshul dang /
365b6('bum): sgra pa'i tshul dang / dri pa'i tshul dang / ro pa'i tshul dang / reg pa'i tshul dang / chos pa'i tshul dang / gi rnam par shes pa pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam
365b7('bum): par shes pa pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa'i
366a1('bum): tshul dang / gi 'dus te reg pa pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i tshul dang /
366a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i tshul dang / gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa'i
366a3('bum): tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus
366a4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams pa'i tshul dang / khams pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams pa'i tshul dang /
366a5('bum): nam mkha'i khams pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa pa'i tshul dang /
366a6('bum): dang gzugs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug pa'i tshul dang / reg pa pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba pa'i tshul dang / sred pa pa'i tshul dang / len pa pa'i tshul dang /
366a7('bum): srid pa pa'i tshul dang / skye ba pa'i tshul dang / rga shi pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i
366b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i tshul dang / nang stong
366b2('bum): pa nyid mi pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa
366b3('bum): stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi pa'i tshul dang /
366b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
366b5('bum): stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / pa stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
366b6('bum): pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga pa'i tshul dang /
366b7('bum): stobs lnga pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / bsam
367a1('bum): gtan bzhi pa'i tshul dang / tshad pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'i tshul
367a2('bum): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa med pa pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga pa'i tshul
367a3('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / so so
367a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu pa'i tshul dang / lan cig
367a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu pa'i tshul dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
367a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
367a7('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro
367b1('bum): ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
367b2('bum): pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
367b3('bum): bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i/
367b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs
367b5('bum): can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do// kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ shes rab kyi pha
367b6('bum): rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ram/ bye brag so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan
367b7('bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du/ yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o//
368a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
368a2('bum): zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam du bgyis te/ bcangs pa dang / tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
368a3('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis
368a4('bum): pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
368a5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/
368a6('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa
368a7('bum): byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs
368b1('bum): pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir
368b2('bum): byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/
368b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bgyis
368b4('bum): bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
368b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis/ 'dul
368b6('bum): ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du/ thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las/ chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la
368b7('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kau
369a1('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
369a2('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na/ rigs
369a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing
369a4('bum): bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas/ bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo//
369a5('bum): bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan
369a6('bum): zhes bya ba kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da
369a7('bum): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon
369b1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang / phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na pa yang
369b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / nyan thos
369b3('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob bo//
369b4('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
369b5('bum): par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / byang chub
369b6('bum): sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs so 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
369b7('bum): ro/ / kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
370a1('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
370a2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o//
370a3('bum): mchod par bya'o// kau shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
370a4('bum): phu dud dang / mchod pa bya ste/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ kau shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / dang lha dang lha
370a5('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nang dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de ltar yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la/
370a6('bum): rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bya ste/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya'o// snyam du bsams so// kau shi ka chos de 'di gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ kau shi ka
370a7('bum): de ltar nga nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ kau
370b1('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bya
370b2('bum): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i
370b3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
370b4('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
370b5('bum): las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
370b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi
370b7('bum): theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
371a1('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ bla na pa yang dag
371a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// 'thob bo//
371a3('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu
371a4('bum): gnyis so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las
371a5('bum): kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus/ de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
371a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa 'am/ bri ba'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de
371a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing / yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun
371b1('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob
371b2('bum): pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob
371b3('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na pa yang dag par
371b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos rgya cher
371b5('bum): bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
371b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
371b7('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
372a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
372a2('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
372a3('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
372a4('bum): bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / 'di dag ni
372a5('bum): zag pa pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
372a6('bum): sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
372a7('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems can
372b1('bum): dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
372b2('bum): 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ kau shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams/ rgyun tu
372b3('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub
372b4('bum): la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu
372b5('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun
372b6('bum): 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ / kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
372b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad
373a1('bum): pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ / kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
373a2('bum): kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs
373a3('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can
373a4('bum): gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// kau shi ka rigs
373a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
373a6('bum): bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i
373a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de
373b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
373b2('bum): bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna
373b3('bum): tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi
373b4('bum): lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang
373b5('bum): ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam bri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/
373b6('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon
373b7('bum): par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
374a1('bum): ro/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang
374a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na
374a3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta
374a4('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang
374a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
374a6('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
374a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
374b1('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
374b2('bum): pa dang smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
374b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi
374b4('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
374b5('bum): shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yang
374b6('bum): do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
374b7('bum): yod do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad
375a1('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha
375a2('bum): rnams yod do/ / chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom
375a3('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du
375a4('bum): shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
375a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don
375a6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin
375a7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
375b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//
375b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa
375b3('bum): brgyad yod do/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs
375b4('bum): kyi sgo rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu
375b5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
375b6('bum): pa nyid yod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems
375b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
376a1('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
376a2('bum): mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
376a3('bum): pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos
376a4('bum): rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
376a5('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid
376a6('bum): thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
376a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
376b1('bum): rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
376b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
376b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
376b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
376b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par
376b6('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
376b7('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
377a1('bum): dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
377a2('bum): glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
377a3('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
377a4('bum): yod do/ / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod
377a5('bum): do/ / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun
377a6('bum): snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad
377a7('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams
377b1('bum): yod do/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
377b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha tu
377b3('bum): pa yod do/ / nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
377b4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod
377b5('bum): do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod
377b6('bum): do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//
377b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
378a1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//
378a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
378a3('bum): bu yod do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad
378a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub
378a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
378a6('bum): rnams lta zhog gi/ / kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can/ ji snyed cig yod pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi
378a7('bum): ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
378b1('bum): kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
378b2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to//
378b3('bum): 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong
378b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to 'thob bo/ / thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
378b5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
378b6('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
378b7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
379a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
379a2('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa
379a3('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
379a4('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
379a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
379a6('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag
379a7('bum): kyang rgya cher bstan to/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas
379b1('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
379b2('bum): yod do/ / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//
379b3('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha
379b4('bum): rnams yod do/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung
379b5('bum): dge'i lha rnams yod do/ / tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams
379b6('bum): yod do/ / che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
379b7('bum): rnams yod do/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha
380a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//
380a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das
380a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong
380a4('bum): pa nyid yod do/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag bar spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
380a5('bum): yod do/ / dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//
380a6('bum): tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
380a7('bum): ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do//
380b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
380b2('bum): do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba
380b3('bum): rnams yod do/ / dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
380b4('bum): yod do/ / // shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
380b5('bum): 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
380b6('bum): lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
380b7('bum): bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
381a1('bum): bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
381a2('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//
381a3('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
381a4('bum): par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
381a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang / gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
381a6('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
381a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
381b1('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
381b2('bum): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
381b3('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon
381b4('bum): pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
381b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau
381b6('bum): shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams
381b7('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyas rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
382a1('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams
382a2('bum): yod do/ / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha
382a3('bum): rnams yod do/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung
382a4('bum): dge'i lha rnams yod do/ / tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
382a5('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
382a6('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi
382a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//
382b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//
382b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
382b3('bum): nyid yod do/ / pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag
382b4('bum): par spong ba rnams yod do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i
382b5('bum): bden pa rnams yod do/ / bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
382b6('bum): dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
382b7('bum): rnams yod do/ / 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong
383a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu
383a2('bum): zhugs pa rnams yod do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod
383a3('bum): do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
383a4('bum): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
383a5('bum): 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
383a6('bum): pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa
383a7('bum): pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
383b1('bum): par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra
383b2('bum): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
383b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
383b4('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
383b5('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
383b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid
383b7('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo
384a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
384a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang /
384a3('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
384a4('bum): pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs
384a5('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de
384a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim
384a7('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
384b1('bum): yod do/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams
384b2('bum): yod do/ / chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas
384b3('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ / che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu
384b4('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
384b5('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson
384b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
384b7('bum): yod do/ / chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid
385a1('bum): yod do/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po
385a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//
385a3('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad
385a4('bum): pa rnams yod do/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
385a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do/
385a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
385a7('bum): bu yod do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir
385b1('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do/ / dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
385b2('bum): rnams yod do/ / kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab
385b3('bum): tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
385b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu' ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
385b5('bum): lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par
385b6('bum): zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
385b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang
386a1('bum): chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
386a2('bum): ro/ / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag
386a3('bum): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
386a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
386a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
386a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
386a7('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
386b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
386b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
386b3('bum): chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag
386b4('bum): pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad
386b5('bum): rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
386b6('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
386b7('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
387a1('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung
387a2('bum): che'i lha rnams yod do/ / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha
387a3('bum): rnams yod do/ / 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
387a4('bum): 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam
387a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong
387a6('bum): pa nyid yod do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong
387a7('bum): pa nyid yod do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
387b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//
387b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa
387b3('bum): brgyad yod do/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod
387b4('bum): do/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
387b5('bum): brgyad yod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
387b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems
387b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las
388a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
388a2('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes
388a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa
388a4('bum): pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
388a5('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid
388a6('bum): thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /
388a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
388b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
388b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
388b3('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
388b4('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
388b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
388b6('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
388b7('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa
389a1('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/
389a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i
389a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
389a4('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i
389a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha nams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod
389a6('bum): do/ / snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad
389a7('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams
389b1('bum): yod do/ / gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
389b2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha
389b3('bum): rol tu pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi
389b4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//
389b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
