389b6('bum): pa nyid yod do/ / pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag
389b7('bum): par spong ba rnams yod do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
390a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ / bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis
390a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
390a3('bum): yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun
390a4('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa
390a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub
390a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling
390a7('bum): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
390b1('bum): par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
390b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod
390b3('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang
390b4('bum): dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
390b5('bum): bo/ / thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
390b6('bum): rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug
390b7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa
391a1('bum): pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
391a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
391a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
391a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
391a5('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
391a6('bum): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
391a7('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
391b1('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang / rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs
391b2('bum): bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
391b3('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod
391b4('bum): do/ / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
391b5('bum): yod do/ / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod
391b6('bum): do/ / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha
391b7('bum): rnams yod do/ / tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha
392a1('bum): rnams yod do/ / 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
392a2('bum): do/ / 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
392a3('bum): tu phyin pa yod do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
392a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do//
392a5('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo
392a6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs
392a7('bum): rnams yod do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs
392b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do//
392b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//
392b3('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang
392b4('bum): byang chub yod do/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod
392b5('bum): do/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
392b6('bum): rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs
392b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
393a1('bum): mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa
393a2('bum): dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/
393a3('bum): de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
393a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//
393a5('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
393a6('bum): par zhugs par gyur to/ / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
393a7('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
393b1('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
393b2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
393b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
393b4('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar
393b5('bum): pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
393b6('bum): sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
393b7('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
394a1('bum): pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di
394a2('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
394a3('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//
394a4('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i
394a5('bum): lha rnams yod do/ / chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha
394a6('bum): rnams yod do/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
394a7('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
394b1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ / pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
394b2('bum): tu phyin pa yod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi
394b3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//
394b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid
394b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ / pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do//
394b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
394b7('bum): yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar
395a1('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
395a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
395a3('bum): rnams yod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
395a4('bum): yod do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
395a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// //
